title: Oral English Practice
details: Learn for your future. Start moving toward where you want to be.Your goal may be to learn a new skill or do something that you know will improve your situation. It might be a course of study or even a new career.

title: General Knowledge
details: General Knowledge helps improve our IQ, along with that it can be helpful in different competitive exam.

title: Around the World
details: From this course, we will learn about different cities of the world, their geography, culture, religion, food habit and many more.

title: Handwriting
details: Improve your Handwriting - Improve your Life. Increase your confidence and success in business and academic endeavors by improving your handwriting.

title: Drawing
details: M.Jahangir Hossain Director of PROTIVA Fine arts Academy, Fine arts teacher at PROYASH (A creative organization for autistic children run

title: Coding Programs for Kids
details: Basic programming has become an essential skill for grown-ups and children alike, and the internet is full of coding programs for kids.

title: Cartooning and Doodling
details: Inspire your child into drawing action in this hour-long virtual class. The class teaches a free-form style that deals with the elements of design (color, line, shape, form, and texture) to acheive detailed works of art.

title: Piano Lessons for Kids
details: Learn piano online with professional experts from the best music schools in the country. Pixical provides gamification, peer learning, and play, along with interaction for the best learning experience.

title: Virtual Pre-Ballet Class
details: This virtual Pre-Ballet class for three to five year olds introduces basic vocabulary, positions, concepts and rhythms of ballet. Classical ballet is introduced in a fun and creative way with an emphasis on movement quality and musicality.
